text: 1 of 2 Letter of confirmation for Erasmus+ Teaching Staff Mobility Assignment Academic Year 20__/20__ We herewith confirm that Ms./Mr. ___________________________________________ (title and name) has taught _______ hours in the framework of the ERASMUS+Teaching assignment at our institution from ___/___/___ to ___/___/___ according to the enclosed schedule.
